original_text: So when Martha heard that Jesus was coming, she went and met him, but Mary remained seated in the house.
korean_text: 마르다는 예수께서 오신다는 말을 듣고 곧 나가 맞이하되 마리아는 집에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: So when Martha heard that Jesus was coming
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 마르다가 예수께서 오신다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: but Mary remained seated in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 마리아는 집에 계속 앉아 있었습니다
